snippet.title: Cyber Rats - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Cyber Rats on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3565080/Cyber_Rats/

Cyber Rats is a brutal Rogue-Lite Survival Horror game. Escape a sadistic AI's death maze, or be torn apart trying!"

You are a rat trapped in a sinister, AI-controlled test facility. In deadly mazes, horrifying experiments are conducted on helpless rats every day. Can you complete the objectives of the maze, and escape with your life intact? Can you stop the evil AI, and save the lives of yourself and your fellow lab rats?

Follow the development of the game on this very channel
